title: What Shaco Skin ;_;
body:
I just bought a $25 RP card and i want your thoughts on which Shaco skin to buy? I love Shaco and play him all the time and I wonder if he might be my main some day. :) So whats your favourite skin of Shaco's in game??? Please tell. :D{{champion:35}} {{summoner:11}}

Edit: Also whats the best looking zed and Kha skin???

replies.body: Classic shaco skin, by far the best.
skt best zed, mecha best kha, masked best shaco but no worm.... so probs the new one, wild card shaco
Best Kha'Zix skin is Guardian of the Sands [750rp] and best Zed skin was just on sale. [Shockblade Zed]
Masked Shaco! I own it personally and It changes the boxes. I think it changes your e [dagger throw] and changes the smoke that appears when you use your ult! Either way the decision is up to you! :)

Wild Card actually looks really good, or Masked Shaco.
Those two are your best bets :)
The best skins imo are Workshop or Nutcracko, but obviously you can't get them. Out of the available ones, Mad Hatter or Wild Card seem like the better ones.

Masked shaco is the best skin, the new one isn't bad, but its ult lets it down because when it explodes, the daggers that come out are nomal unskinned daggers instead of the daggers for that skin.

zed only has one available skin and thats the shockblade skin, but thats the best one anyway so all good 

and i prefer the guardian of the sands kha, because the colours on the mecha one look odd until you upgrade the ult but then it looks epic.

My one i use every time legit every single time is Nutcracko shaco you can't get it now but mmm love that skin.
Butâ€¦ I would choose the new shaco skin looks pretty sick
Yeah the new one is the best one.
I use masked but now that wild card is out that looks like the best one!
i think the arclight vayno is the best one. It's the skin that looks like arclight vayne because it is arclight vayne and shaco is a garbage champ with no skins worth wasting rp on.

> [{quoted}](name=Arclight Vayne,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LAAFtPqu,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-05-30T13:50:48.460+0000)
>
> i think the arclight vayno is the best one. It's the skin that looks like arclight vayne because it is arclight vayne and shaco is a garbage champ with no skins worth wasting rp on.

:,( Downvoted.
